speaker: Dark Forest
lines: The trees whisper. Few listen twice.
You walk deeper into the forest, the trees are getting thicker and the air is getting darker.
You hear the sounds of animals in the distance, but you can't see them.
There is an odd clearing which streches out in front of you, the trees are thinned out and you can see the sky.
There is a young woman sitting in the clearing, crying and looking around nervously.
